titles.title: To remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System certain properties in New Jersey.
To remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System certain properties in New Jersey.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Power and Oceans.

bill.summary: This bill directs the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service to remove specific properties in Brick, New Jersey, from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System.
